website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight serum that will brighten your complexion and soothe your skin in just a few treatments.
pros: 75% hyaluronic acid complex helps keep skin hydrated
Soothes and plumps dry, flaky skin
Gives you a healthy, glowing complexion
Makes skin look younger by smoothing out the appearance of fine lines
Lightweight and absorbs readily into the skin without leaving a residue
cons: If you have really dry skin, this may not be hydrating enough for you

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this!! Price much less than Ulta, using twice a day and after several weeks of use in different climates and altitudes, I see a visible difference. One note of caution, this did not travel well, very glad that I had it in its own zip lock bag to contain any spillage and still make use of what leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this because I have really dry skin and I saw that this was a highly rated hyaluronic acid product. I was also really excited that it is so much cheaper on Amazon than it is at Sephora. However, in comparison with other drug store serums I have used (some with hyaluronic acid and some without) I found that this serum did not make my skin feel soft or hydrated. It almost made my skin feel stripped of the softness it usually has. I will be going back to my previous serum.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This item wasn’t as expected. I didn’t show improvement with lines or softer, more hydrated skin. My skin remained dry and flakey looking. I’m thinking it may have everything to do with being ordered from Amazon. Amazon is notorious for selling knock off brands at full price...well, allowing their sellers to sell knock offs. Will possibly retry another time but directly from Peter Roth or even Ulta. When I muster the energy to spend $65 again on a serum. Bummed I spent as much as I did on something that’s not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice hyaluronic serum
customer_reviews.text: Did a ton of research before purchasing this serum and I’m happy this far. It has a great formulation and has delivered. Save for the fact it doesn’t absorb quickly, I’d give it 5 STARS. (You sort of have to work it in more than other serums of this type.) My husband has eczema on his face and it has cleared up the spot in only two days! I use it for anti-aging goodness 😁

product_meta.title: Water Drench Hyaluronic Liquid Gel Cloud Serum, Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Fine Lines and Uneven Texture
product_meta.description:
Drench your skin with a liquid cloud of lightweight moisture for a silky soft, matte finish. Clear liquid gel serum has a 75% complex of Hyaluronic Acid, a potent hydrator that draws in water. Helps plump the look of skin with moisture. Provides an invisible silk veil of hydration with Sodium PCA and Silk Proteins. Helps reduce the look of fine lines and rough texture to leave skin appearing smoother and more youthful. Oil-free, fragrance-free.

BRAND STORY
An influential segment leader in the beauty industry, Peter Thomas Roth corners the clinical market as a groundbreaking, results-focused innovator committed to his brand philosophy: Breakthrough formulas. Astonishing results.
